sense.def:
Kar je
slight
, je številčno ali količinsko zelo majhno.

seg.quote: He had a slight German accent.
I haven't the slightest idea what you're talking about.
White wine should be slightly chilled.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
in the slightest
poudarimo nikalno trditev.

seg.quote: My tennis hadn't improved in the slightest.

sense.def:
Kdor je
slight
, ima vitko in krhko telo.

seg.quote: I watched her slight figure cross the street.

sense.def:
To slight someone
pomeni nekoga užaliti, ker z njim delamo, kot da je nepomemben.

seg.quote: His fear of being slighted made him avoid people.
It was a slight on a past award-winner, Stevenson.
